ESPublicQuery.SQL: SELECT ESFITradeAccount.GID AS GID, ESFITradeAccount.Code AS Code, ESFITradeAccount.Name AS Name, ESFITradeAccount.Inactive AS Inactive, FK_ESGOPerson_PersonCode1.TaxRegistrationNumber AS TaxRegistrationNumber, FK_ESGOPerson_ESGOSites.Address1 AS Address1, FK_ESGOPerson_ESGOSites.fPostalCode AS fPostalCode, FK_ESGOPerson_ESGOSites.fCityCode AS fCityCode, FK_ESGOPerson_ESGOSites.fCountryCode AS fCountryCode, FK_ESGOPerson_ESGOSites.Telephone1 AS Telephone1, FK_ESGOPerson_ESGOSites.email AS email FROM ESFITradeAccount AS ESFITradeAccount LEFT JOIN ESGOPerson AS FK_ESGOPerson_PersonCode1 ON ESFITradeAccount.fPersonCodeGID = FK_ESGOPerson_PersonCode1.GID INNER JOIN ESGOSites AS FK_ESGOPerson_ESGOSites ON FK_ESGOPerson_PersonCode1.fMainAddressGID = FK_ESGOPerson_ESGOSites.GID WHERE (ESEqual(ESFITradeAccount.fCompanyCode, ##(ESCOMPANY))) AND (ESFITradeAccount.Type = 0) AND (ESEqual(ESFITradeAccount.Inactive, @Inactive)) AND (ESEqual(FK_ESGOPerson_PersonCode1.TaxRegistrationNumber, @TaxRegistrationNumber)) AND (ESEqual(ESFITradeAccount.Code, @Code)) AND (ESEqual(ESFITradeAccount.Name, @Name)) AND (ESEqual(FK_ESGOPerson_ESGOSites.fPostalCode, @fPostalCode)) AND (ESEqual(FK_ESGOPerson_ESGOSites.email, @email))
